abstract: After months of speculation as to where Alan D. Schwartz might alight for his next act, the former Bear Stearns chief, it seems, has finally landed.
snippet: After months of speculation as to where Alan D. Schwartz might alight for his next act, the former Bear Stearns chief, it seems, has finally landed.
lead_paragraph: After months of speculation as to where Alan D. Schwartz might alight for his next act, the former Bear Stearns chief executive, it seems, has finally landed.

headline.main: After Bear, Schwartz to Join Guggenheim Partners
